Updated Value: This is used when the address is created. If the value is not set or true, then the system will, if necessary, auto-correct the address you provide. Set this value to false if the system should not auto-correct the address.
The city in which this address is in
The ISO country code of this address
The globally unique identifier for the object.
The postal code this address is in
The state or region this address is in
The number and street address where this address is located.
